roleset.name: to be lazy or move about in a lazy fashion
roleset.note: LOAF-V NOTES: Added by Kevin (from loaf.01-v)

example.name: movement usage
example.text: Manny loafed toward second base after blasting the ball over the center fielder's head.
example.arg: after blasting the ball over the center fielder's head

example.name: loaf about (non-directional) usage
example.text: Charlene loafed about the back yard all afternoon.
